title: Please identify this upright serif font for book typesetting
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725010817im_/http:/typophile.com/files/detail_4822.jpg)

It looks open, light, pretty crisp, and modern, but has this "baroque" leg at the "R".  
Sorry for the scan, nothing better available at the moment.

Thanks for your help!
author: Gunnar
